org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules

Class Printer

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlockingBladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.modules.Printer

  • public class Printer
extends BlockingBladeBase

    A blocking blade is used for printing.

    Sample Usage:

     public class PrinterSample {

     public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

         //A facility with one thread.
         final Plant plant = new Plant(1);

         try {

             //Print something.
             Printer.printlnAReq(plant, "Hello World!").call();

         } finally {
             //shutdown the plant
             plant.close();
         }

     }
 }
